creator.description:
Providing labels for:

* race spoilers: if you haven't watched the race yet 
* off topic content: to keep it out of the Pro cycling chatter feed: https://bsky.app/profile/did:plc:542d7hnrdfvkldeieefmajxl/feed/discovercycling

locales.description: This content has been marked unrelated to pro cycling, as was possibly mis-included in the Pro Cycling Chatter feed.
locales.name: Unrelated content

locales.description: This content may spoil a race for those who haven't watched it yet.
locales.name: Race Spoiler
